relationships.description: Harry looks out of his window and sees the Whomping Willow.
Harry sets down his goblet before looking out of the window.
Harry thinks he sees the Grim prowling across the lawn.
Harry spots a cat skirting around the edge of the forest.
Harry recognizes the cat as Crookshanks due to its bottlebrush tail.
